heading: This Afternoon
text: A rising chance of showers, more so north of Route 4.

heading: Tonight
text: Chance of rain showers, mixing with snow over the mountains.

heading: Friday
text: A rising chance of rain or mountain snow showers, mainly north.

heading: Saturday
text: Chance of sprinkles or mountain flurries.
temperature: Valleys mid 40s to mid 50s, north to south
